TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WorkflowQueue extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

span.span: Represents a workflow queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 工作流队列用于在主机或主机服务与工作流中的活动之间传递消息。Workflow queues are used to pass messages between a host or host services and activities in a workflow. 任何活动均可以通过调用 来创建 ，并且宿主、服务或其他活动可以调用 来向该 添加项。Any activity can create a by calling , and a host, a service, or another activity can call to add an item to that . 您可以订阅 事件，以便在项到达 时获得通知。You can subscribe to the event to be notified when an item arrives on the . 您可以使用 在 的开始处检查项，并使用 从 中移除项。You can use to examine an item at the beginning of the and to remove an item from the . 每个 都与 相关联，您可以使用该服务对 执行其他管理操作，如删除队列。Each is associated with a that you can use to perform other management operations on the , such as deleting the queue. 将公开与此 关联的 。 exposes the associated with this . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何通过调用 方法创建 。The following code example demonstrates how you can create a by calling the method. 此示例还使用 属性确定当前队列中是否存在任何消息。It also uses the property to determine whether any messages exist in the current queue. 最后，代码使用 方法移除并返回队列中的第一个对象。Finally, the code uses the method to remove and return the first object in the queue. 此代码示例摘自 FileSystemEvent.cs 文件的“文件观察程序活动”SDK 示例。This code example is part of the File Watcher Activity SDK Sample from the FileSystemEvent.cs file. 有关详细信息，请参阅[文件系统观察程序活动](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5442b63a-bdad-43d0-b7cf-f0b5d8b56a99)。For more information, see [File System Watcher Activity](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5442b63a-bdad-43d0-b7cf-f0b5d8b56a99). [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#227](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets24.cs#227)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#227](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets24.vb#227)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event QueueItemArrived As EventHandler(Of QueueEventArgs)

summary.span: 在此 上传送项时发生。

span.span: Occurs when an item is delivered on this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件仅适用于必须与向工作流实例进行的事件传送同步发生的处理。This event is only used for processing that must occur synchronously with event delivery to the workflow instance. 事件处理程序可能在非工作流线程上执行，因此必须保护对任何共享工作流对象（例如，任何 ）的访问。The event handler may execute on a non-workflow thread so access to any shared workflow object, for example, any , must be protected.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event QueueItemAvailable As EventHandler(Of QueueEventArgs)

summary.span: 当项在此 上可用时发生。

span.span: Occurs when an item is available on this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件以异步方式引发。The event is raised in an asynchronous manner. 事件的发送方将是订阅 的 。The sender for the event will be the of the subscribing .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工作流队列的名称由 方法设置。The name of the workflow queue is set by the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用重载的 方法为 事件注册一个订户。You can use the overloaded methods to register a subscriber for the event. 事件用于通知订户项已经传送（以异步方式）至此 。The event is used to notify subscribers that an item has been delivered (in an asynchronous manner) to this .
